text: antatah allaah kee anugya se unhonne unako paraajit kar diya aur daood ne jaaloot ko qatl kar diya, aur allaah ne use raajy aur tatvadarshita (hikamat) pradaan kee, jo kuchh vah (daood) chaahe, usase usako avagat karaaya. aur yadi allaah manushyon ke ek giroh ko doosare giroh ke dvaara hataata na rahata to dharatee kee vyavastha bigad jaatee, kintu allaah sansaaravaalon ke lie udaar anugraahee hai
